description: Leverage AD directory synchronization (DirSync) to monitor changes to directory state using AD replication cookies.(Citation: Microsoft DirSync)Â (Citation: ADDSecurity DCShadow Feb 2018) Also consider monitoring and alerting on the replication of AD objects (Audit Detailed Directory Service Replication Events 4928 and 4929). (Citation: DCShadow Blog)
